After joining the time and Space Administration, Li Yu was entrusted with an important task and became the only villain administrator in the world.

In the face of the bosses whose danger index has exploded, he must put on one vest after another, “honest little driver,” “local landlord and pretty tenant,” “aristocratic loyal servant,” “pendant of blackened general”….

Li Yu rubbed his hands excitedly, took his life-saving toolbox and was ready to start working.

System: Emergency reminder, in each world, the toolbox must be reopened using the secret language, which is the villain’s love. 

Li Yu: ? ? ? Is it too late to resign now?

Villain: Be good, let me share some love words.
